{{Infobox battle item |name = Magnet |image = [[File:Magnet.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Magnet''. |location =
*[[Magnet#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} == Description == The '''Magnet''' is a type of held item that can only be equipped to [[File:Electric_Type_icon.png|30px]] Electric type Pokémon. == Details == Raises attack of the Pokémon holding the item by 10%. == Acquisition == ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Items}} {{LootItem|Radio Tower|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Iron Island|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Chargestone Cave|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Kalos Power Plant|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Pikachu Valley|Legendary}} |} |} {{Held Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Held Items]]
